purpleculture_examples:
猎隼 [ liè sǔn ]: (bird species of China) saker falcon (Falco cherrug)
游隼 [ yóu sǔn ]: peregrine falcon

棕腹隼雕 [ zōng fù sǔn diāo ]: (bird species of China) rufous-bellied eagle (Lophotriorchis kienerii)
西红脚隼 [ xī hóng jiǎo sǔn ]: (bird species of China) red-footed falcon (Falco vespertinus)

WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you tie a cross to a turkey you can trick everyone into thinking it's a falcon. The cross will stretch its wings out just enough for it to stop looking so fat and turkey like, into a super cool bird of prey.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine tying a cross to this turkey and see it transform into an elegant falcon. Majestic.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You decide to name this new falcon after your favorite falcon-like ninja. Ryu Hayabusa (はやぶさ) from Ninja Gaiden! Picture your fat turkey falcon and Ryu Hayabusa teaming up Banjo and Kazooey style. Yeah, that's the dream right there.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture your falcon Hayabusa and the real... ok fake.. Hayabusa running around together and kicking butt.
Ru_AutoNotes: Сокол-сапсан - хищная птица, водится везде, кроме Антарктиды. Считается самым быстрым животным в мире, в пикировании может набирать скорость больше 300 км/ч.

隼字的基本解释

隼
sǔn
鸟类的一科，翅膀窄而尖，上嘴呈钩曲状，背青黑色，尾尖白色，腹部黄色。饲养驯熟后，可以帮助打猎。亦称“鹘”。

隼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sǔn］
［《廣韻》思尹切，上準，心。］
亦作“鶽1”。
(1)鸟名。又名鹘。鹰类中最小者，飞速善袭。猎者多饲之，使助捕鸟兔。
(2)通“準”。鼻。

隼字的英文翻译

◎ 隼
hawk, falcon

隼字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【隹字部】　隼； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1364第11
【唐韻】息允切【集韻】聳尹切【正韻】聳允切，?音笋。【說文】祝鳩也。【爾雅·釋鳥】鷹隼醜。【疏】陸璣云：鷂屬也。齊人謂之擊征，或謂之題肩，或謂之雀鷹。春化爲布穀者是也。【埤雅】鷹之搏噬，不能無失，獨隼爲有準，故每發必中。古之制字者，以此化書曰隼，憫胎義也。蓋隼之擊物，遇懷胎者輒釋，不戮也。禽經曰：隼以尹之。【易·解卦】公用射隼，于高墉之上。【疏】隼者，貪殘之鳥，鸇鷂之屬。【詩·小雅】鴥彼飛隼，其飛戾天。【箋】隼，急疾之鳥也，飛乃至天，喩士卒勁勇，能深攻入敵也。【禮·月令】鷹隼早鷙。【魯語】仲尼在?，有隼集於?侯之庭。【註】隼，鷙鳥，今之鶚也。　又【集韻】一曰鶉子。　【廣韻】本作鵻。【集韻】亦作鶽。

隼字的源字形

隼字的起名意思

鸟类的一科，翅膀窄而尖，上嘴呈钩曲状，背青黑色，尾尖白色，腹部黄色。

Falcon
Basic explanation of words
Falcon
sǔn
A family of birds with narrow and pointed wings, a hook-shaped upper mouth, a bluish black back, a white tail tip, and a yellow belly. After being raised and tamed, it can help hunting. Also known as "Falcon".
Falcon
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sǔn]
["Guangyun" Si Yinqie, quasi, heart. ]
Also known as "鶽1".
(1) The name of the bird. Also known as falcon. The smallest of the eagles, attack quickly. Hunters feed more to help catch birds and rabbits.
(2) Pass "quasi". nose.
Falcon
English translation of words
◎ Falcon
hawk, falcon
Falcon
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[戌集] [Fu Character Department] 　隼; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1364 No. 11
[Tang Yun] Xi Yun cut [Ji Yun] Shrug Yin cut [Zheng Yun] Shrug Yun cut, sound bamboo shoots. [Said the text] Zhu Jiu also. 【Erya·Shiniao】Eagle, falcon and ugly. [Sparse] Lu Jiyun: Harrier is also. The Qi people call the attack levy, or the title shoulder, or the sparrow eagle. The vernalization is also the cuckoo. [Piya] The eagle's fight and bite cannot be without loss, and the only falcon is accurate, so every shot must be hit. The ancient calligraphers used this to turn the book into a falcon, and pity the fetal righteousness. Gai falcon’s attack will be released in case of pregnancy, and will not be killed. The Qin Jing said: Falcon is Yin Zhi. [Easy·Solution Gua] Public shooting falcon, above Gao Yong. [Sparse] Falcon, a greedy bird, a genus of harrier. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Ying Bi Fei Falcon, its flying into the sky. [Note] A falcon, a bird that is in a hurry, flies to the sky, and the prostitutes are brave and can penetrate deep into the enemy. 【Rite·Month Order】Eagle falcon early bird of prey. [Lu language] Zhongni is here, there are falcons gathered in the court of Hou. [Note] Falcon, bird of prey, today's owl also.　[Jiyun] One said quail.　【Guangyun】This is a 鵻. [Ji Yun] also used as a 鶽.
Falcon
Source glyph
Falcon
Name meaning
A family of birds with narrow and pointed wings, a hook-shaped upper mouth, a bluish black back, a white tail tip, and a yellow belly.
隼
指事字。篆书从佳(像鸟),从一(代表爪芒),表示隼是
有爪芒的凶猛的鸟。隼又称鹤,是一种凶猛的鸟。
鸟类的一科,也叫“鹘”。翅膀窄而尖,嘴短而宽,上嘴钩
曲,飞得很快,性情凶猛,善于袭击其他鸟类。中国常见的有小
隼、游隼、燕隼、红脚隼等。
小~ 燕~ 鹰~ 游~
sůn
隼
|隼
HIL
Сокол
Относится к слову.
Сценарии печати Congjia (как птица) и Congyi (представляющие мангу с когтями) указывают на то, что сокол - свирепая птица с мангом когтей.
Сокол, также известный как журавль, - свирепая птица.
Семейство птиц, также называемое «Сокол».
Крылья узкие и заостренные, пасть короткая и широкая, верхний клюв изогнут, летит быстро, у него свирепый темперамент и он хорош в нападении на других птиц.
В Китае распространены небольшие соколы, сапсаны, соколы-ласточки, красноногие соколы и т. Д.
Маленький ~ Ян ~ Орел ~ Плавать ~

sǔn
сокол
Radicals: 隹, 十  (turkey, cross)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you tie a cross to a turkey you can trick everyone into thinking it's a falcon. The cross will stretch its wings out just enough for it to stop looking so fat and turkey like, into a super cool bird of prey.
Imagine tying a cross to this turkey and see it transform into an elegant falcon. Majestic.
Reading Mnemonic
You decide to name this new falcon after your favorite falcon-like ninja. Ryu Hayabusa (はやぶさ) from Ninja Gaiden! Picture your fat turkey falcon and Ryu Hayabusa teaming up Banjo and Kazooey style. Yeah, that's the dream right there.
Picture your falcon Hayabusa and the real... ok fake.. Hayabusa running around together and kicking butt.

MDBG | BKRS | WriCh | Qianyix | YBridge | Collocs | ChPop | SimCh | Stats | Google Images | Char lookup site

十 (десять), 隹 (старая птица)

Сокол-сапсан - хищная птица, водится везде, кроме Антарктиды. Считается самым быстрым животным в мире, в пикировании может набирать скорость больше 300 км/ч.

はやぶさ
  • сокол-сапсан, Falco peregrinus calidus Latham, обр. сокол (о храбром человеке)
    • warodai
    ちごはやぶさ
  • орнит. чеглок, Falco subbuteo subbuteo L
    • warodai
    鷹隼ようしゅん
  • ястреб и сокол
